segments.text: Those kids are up to no good, and the woman doesn't even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy standing on a wobbly stool, reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there, waiting for her share, looking so eager.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they've done this before; they seem too comfortable with the sneaking around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit angry that the woman isn't paying attention to what's going on behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just there, drying dishes like nothing else matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll get mad when she finds out about the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so careful, but it's only a matter of time before something goes wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get into too much trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
